trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract base class from which all implementations of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> subelements inherit.
trans-unit.target: Representerer abstrakt basisklasse fra som alle implementeringer av <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"> </xref> underelementene arver.

trans-unit.source: You can use KeyInfoClause objects to build a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> object for a specific digital signature or encrypted XML document.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke KeyInfoClause objekter for å bygge en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>objekt for en bestemt digital signatur eller kryptert XML-dokument.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> allows recipients of XML digital signatures and encrypted XML documents to determine which signing method and key values should be used for validation and decryption.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>tillater at mottakerne av XML-signaturer og krypterte XML-dokumenter å finne ut hvilke signering metoden og nøkkel verdier som skal brukes for validerings- og dekrypteringsnøkler.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> element and its subelements, see the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or see the XML encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>element og tilhørende underelementene se spesifikasjonen XMLDSIG som er tilgjengelig fra W3C på www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, eller se spesifikasjonen XML-kryptering, som er tilgjengelig fra W3C på www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke opprette en forekomst av en abstrakt klasse.

trans-unit.source: Application code creates a new instance of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Programmet kode oppretter en ny forekomst av en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns an XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, returnerer en XML-representasjon av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> returned by this method is suitable for use as a subelement of an XMLDSIG or encrypted XML `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>returneres av denne metoden passer for bruk som et delelement en XMLDSIG eller krypterte XML `<KeyInfo>` element.</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, parses the input <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> and configures the internal state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref> to match.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, analyserer inndataene <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> og konfigurerer den interne tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"> </xref> samsvarer.

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used to process a subelement of a `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes vanligvis til å behandle et delelement for en `<KeyInfo>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that specifies the state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> som angir status for den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"> </xref>.
